entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Standalone Webassembly - Has no way to call Azure B2C edit profile user flow #53084
  • How to bind a complex string type to Checkbox in Blazor? #53083
  • How to create custom metadata provider in .net core? #53082
  • [Blazor WASM] Upgrading project to .NET 8 and breaks [Authorize] Attribute #53075

Closed

  • www:Masikin Arjuna.com #53076

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `76bb2af` to `dddb219` #53079
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `74055e1` to `69f4ccb` #53078
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `76bb2af` to `dddb219` #53077
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x

Updated

  • Allow user to specify antiforgery request token source #51962
    community-contribution, feature-mvc-antiforgery, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • [release/8.0] Fix SSR page rendering intermediate state instead of the end state of components #52943
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x
